Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.updates

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardUpdate
    This class represents an update sent from Server to Client every time the Match Board changes (for example, after a move/build, or after a Player lost)
    DisconnectedPlayerUpdate
    This class represents an update sent from Server to Client every time a Player disconnected.
    ErrorUpdate
    This class represents an update sent from Server to Client every time an error occurs.
    GamePhaseUpdate
    This class represents an update sent from Server to Client every the Game Phase changes.
    GodsUpdate
    This class represents an update sent from Server to Client every time new Gods have been chosen (so the game state changed)
    InitialInfoUpdate
    This class represents an update sent from Server to Client every time new initial info have been chosen (so the game state changed) (example: a Player chose its nickname and color)
    LoseUpdate
    This class represents an update sent from Server to Client every time a Player loses.
    MatchStartedUpdate
    This class represents an update sent from Server to Client when the match actually starts.
    ServerUnreachableUpdate
    This class represents an update sent generated locally by the client to notify the view that the Server is not reachable.
    TurnUpdate
    This class represents an update sent from Server to Client every time the current turn changes.
    Update
    This abstract class represents a message exchanged between Client and Server.
    WinUpdate
    This class represents an update sent from Server to Client when a Player wins the match.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LoseUpdate.LoseCause
    Enum representing what made the Player lose, in this case a Player can lose if it can't move when its turn starts, or if it can't build after a move command.
